title: ml-hyperopt pipeline parameters
description: Proof-of-concept pipeline for training and evaluating machine learning models with Nextflow. Not all parameters are included in this schema, refer to the nextflow.config for more details.

fetch_dataset.description: Fetch a dataset by name from OpenML

dataset_name.description: Name of dataset to fetch from OpenML

visualize.description: Visualize the training and test sets

datadir.description: Directory that contains any input datasets and pre-trained models

train.description: Train a set of models on the given training set(s)

predict.description: Evaluate a set of trained models on the given test set(s)
